Name: Sailor's Swizzle
Ingredients: 45 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of aromatic bitters and lime zest.
POUR all ingredients into chilled glass.
Two-thirds fill glass with crushed ice and SWIZZLE .
Add more crushed ice to fill glass and SWIZZLE some more.
Garnish with lime zest twist and dash bitters over ice cap.
Review: Port wine is further fortified with golden rum and delicately spiced with pimento dram in this swizzled punch.
History: Created in 2012 by Erik Lorincz at , London, England.
